subject: Re: [junit] Re: Need Advice on Unit Testing Pain
msgSnippet: ... Look into the files area of the extremeprogramming yahoo group. You ll find two or three servlet testing frameworks there. Johannes
messageBody:
> Anyone have any experiences with J2EEUnit, or with otherwise simulating
> HTTP sessions and responses?

Look into the files area of the "extremeprogramming" yahoo group. You'll
find two or three servlet testing frameworks there.

Johannes
